/usr/bin/c++  -o3 -g   CMakeFiles/LibraryTester.dir/main.cpp.o  -o LibraryTester   -L"/home/marco/OpenGL Projects/PointShadows/ProjectFiles/./Library"  -Wl,-rpath,"/home/marco/OpenGL Projects/PointShadows/ProjectFiles/./Library" -lRendererLibrary /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so -lGL -lGLU -lGLEW -lglfw -lassimp
